document_data.name: ''Rod of Frost''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rods of frost''''' were [[enchanted]] [[rod]]s that allowed the wielder to fire rays of freezing cold.
document_data.Description: ''Rods of frost'' were {{SIAdj|2|ft|long=yes|adj=long}} transparent [[glassteel]] rods bound with [[iron]] bands and weighing {{SI|5|lb|long=yes}}.
document_data.Powers: When activated, these ''rods'' emitted a {{SIAdj|30|ft|long=yes|adj=long}} ''[[ray of frost]]''. The magical cold of the ray extinguished all flames it touched and froze the entire affected area. The ''ray of frost'' could be blasted three times per day.
document_data.Creation: A skilled crafter of wondrous items could create such rods with the use ''ray of frost'' spell. The process usually took two days and cost 700 [[gp]].
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''rods of frost'' could be found throughout the [[Sword Coast]] region, notably in the city of [[Neverwinter]]
document_data.Notable Users:
*[[Jaroo]]: a [[gnome|gnomish]] [[wizard]] and a teacher of the [[Adventurer's Academy]] of Neverwinter. He crafted many ''rods of frost'' to be given out to his most skilled students ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
*[[Vejoni H. Wyzz]]: a planeswalking wizard who sold many enchanted items, including ''rods of frost''. He briefly visited the hamlet of [[Liam's Hold]] in 1372 DR.
